message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it offers excellent value at this price, considering its worth to you.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $14,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. This price is fair considering its value to me and your desired selling price.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500? This allows us both to benefit from the deal.
